entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected deletion of persisted private key on disposing X509Certificate2 object #97121
  • Simple net8 Blazor WASM AOT compiled App not working on Android11 downwards #97119
  • The "Build / browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_EAT" leg's build fails with "Nothing to show. Final logs are missing." #97117
  • Trying to load CustomModifiers for runtime field hits an assert #97116
  • Set CMP0112 to the `NEW` behavior and fix any target dependency issues. #97113
    9.0.0
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests time out #97112
  • Update some of NativeAOT's uses of Lock to use non-alertable waits #97105
    9.0.0
  • BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration test failing in CI #97103
    9.0.0
  • [.NET8 + WebAssembly] Debugging experience still is far from being 'OK' #97097
  • Nuget package "System.DirectoryServices 8.0" is not compatible to .NET6 #97094
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.ConnectTest.ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedInflightConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException #97092
    9.0.0
  • Function worker's service provider resolves scoped service from the root as singleton #97091
    9.0.0
  • Remove pinned xunit.analyzers version #97088
    9.0.0
  • HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT has invalid value on custom .NET runtime host on Linux #97086
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threadin SignalR in Blazor WBT #97085
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: AVX-512 Mask Operation Intrinsics #97081
  • Proposal: add comments to specific kinds of generated code disassembly #97060

Closed

  • Enable CMake policy CMP0117 and update the corresponding compile options throughout the repo. #94354
    9.0.0
  • Enable CMake policy CMP0092 and update the corresponding compile options throughout the repo. #96815
    9.0.0
  • Reduce unnecessary allocations in TLS handshake (windows) #68951
    9.0.0
  • Document metric Instrument lifetime or make instruments disposable #97061
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry( "LDAP://" + this.dnsHostName + "/" + this.defaultNamingContext, this.credentials, this.authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94775
  • Domain.GetComputerDomain() is not disposed at the end of the function #94771
  • new DirectoryEntry(nativeMember) becomes out of scope and is not disposed #94777
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry("LDAP://" + dnsDomainName + "/" + GetEscapedDN(distinguishedName), this.Credentials, this.authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94776
  • new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Domain) is not disposed at the end of the function #94774
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry(_ctxBase.Path, _credentials, _authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94781
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry(_ctxBase.Path, _credentials, _authTypes) becomes out of scope and is not disposed #94780
  • .NET8 exception on M1 arm setup (Exception has occurred: CLR/System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException) #96061
  • [browser][MT] InvokeAsync in Blazor WASM components calls into the caller thread instead of the UI thread. #95547
    9.0.0
  • On Linux .NET 6, get unexpected AuthenticationException with HttpWebRequest and wildcard usage #96360
  • Solution with mixed Framework/Core/Standard libraries gives errors for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions v6.0.4 #96529
    6.0.x
  • .NET 8 blazor .wasm Lazy Loaded Assemblies throws runtime exception and fails to load #95381
    8.0.x
  • Set the property to look for in JsonDerivedType #97067
  • [8.0] runtime-extra-platforms: ios and tvos - Trimming assemblies requires .NET Core 3.0 or higher #96793
    8.0.x
  • Upgrade to .NET 9 SDK #95605
    9.0.0
  • SslStreamCertificateContext stops fetching OCSP staples after one request failure #96770
    7.0.x
  • Unable to verify signer of OCSP Response on Linux #96659
    7.0.x
  • Tiered miscompilation of Vector2.Dot(x, x) without SSE4.1 #96939
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression] With VSCode on Linux, debugging a .NET 9 project is failed with Unknown Error 0x80131c3c Unable to attach to CoreCLR. #96747
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Validate loop invariant base case as part of IV analysis #97122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support caching ILogger<T> on the ILoggerFactory. #97120
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Rewrite and disable offending test #97118
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Remove some timeouts and reorganize tests #97115
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Exp to Vector64/128/256/512 #97114
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use ParallelTheory attribute to run cases in parallel #97111
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Frozen objects should be identified as Gen2 in the handle table #97109
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Reduce defensive copying in PublicKey #97108
    area-System.Security
  • Update "type-" to "type-safe" #97107
    documentation, area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add capacity hint to OidCollection #97106
    area-System.Security
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (3/n) #97104
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix computing available memory on OSX for GC #97102
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Optimize threshold of BigInteger.Parse #97101
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Mono]: Reduce Mono AOT cross compiler x64 memory footprint. #97096
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Disable dump creation for ParallelCrashTester child #97095
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • WIP: Initial provisions for semantic Crossgen2 PDB validation #97090
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • X86 unix fixes #97089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AT_3A to IF_SVE_BK_3A #97082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Dead code elimination for `if (typeof(T).IsValueType)` #97080
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify regex code gen for whitespace search #97078
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add TaskCompletionSource.SetFromTask #97077
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97076
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Late expansion for casts #97075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #97072
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #97071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #97070
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: remove size contribution to perf score #97069
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix compareTypesForEquality #97062
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make multiple calls to FinalRelease safe #97059
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix Options Source Gen RangeAttribute Thread Safety #97110
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.2
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CY_3A and IF_SVE_CY_3B group #96992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove Explicit Deletion of CMake `/GR` Flag as 3.20's *CMP0117* by Default Doesn't Add It #96814
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable CMake Flag `-W3` as New CMP0092 no Longer Does it Implicitly #97053
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Options Source Gen RangeAttribute Thread Safety #97045
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Augment the backport PR description template to prompt for more info #97073
    area-Meta
  • [Mono] Add amd64 intrinsics for Vector128 Abs #97024
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Clean up unrolling a bit #97100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Remove HybridGlobalization test name extension from iOS tests #97043
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log to Vector64/128/256/512 #96913
    area-System.Numerics
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_DL_2A, IF_SVE_DZ_1A, IF_SVE_EA_1A #97068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Reduce code size impact of `ArrayPool<T>` #97058
    area-System.Buffers
  • [NativeAOT] 32-bit platform ObjWriter and bit rot fixes #96890
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #96018
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #96936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Forward minipal_get_length_utf16_to_utf8 and minipal_convert_utf16_to_utf8 from DAC #97055
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #96951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #97065
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.2
  • [Manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #97064
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.16
  • [Manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #97063
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.27
  • [release/8.0-staging] macOS: Set certificate as a dependency of private key handles #96993
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #97047
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Delete old DFS and dominator implementations #96927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Experiment: Optimize lsra when enregisterLocalVars is false #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow jump-to-next-block removal for blocks with alignment #97011
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Port loop compaction to new loop representation #96995
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Test #96806
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `SortKey` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization clean up the code #96974
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Type test `List<T>` in Enumerable.SequenceEquals and forward to `MemoryExtensions.SequenceEqual(span...)` #97004
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #97002
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • NativeAOT implement warning as errors as a compiler feature #96567
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "[browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode" #97035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't install .net on Docker / debian image in Mac M1 (Couldn't find any package by glob 'dotnet-sdk-6.0') #38090
  • Using the new `--mode` parameter of `dotnet workload update` throws a nullref exception #38078

Closed

  • .NET 8 fails to resolve workload on Fedora #37880

PullRequests

Created

  • Hide stack on WorkloadResolver constructor error #38091
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers
  • Include version in deps.json #38087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Streamline and comment Roslyn->ApiCompat dependencies #38086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Using dotnet workoad update --mode hits NRE on success with MSI-based installs #38082
    Area-Workloads, 8.0.3xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable 8.0.3xx CI builds #38079
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #38051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Interceptors open issues for C# 13 #7835
  • Update `Metadata` section in params-collections.md #7850
  • Add native lock speclet #7849
  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `IDE0004` false positive when `object` is cast to `dynamic` #71695
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Internal.SDK meta-package #71691
  • Unable to go-to-def on a `ValueTuple` #71680
    Backlog
  • Use C# 11 feature in my source code, but the build command: `dotnet build -p:langversion=10` built successfully. #71678
  • Adding an .editorconfig via configuring severity doesn't handle localized Solution Items folders well #71673
    17.10
  • Compilation failed with an explicit event block and primary constructor #71669
  • Create a single nuget feed with upstreams #71667

Closed

  • GetConversion yields incorrect result on collection expression with spread in error case #70217
    17.9
  • Inconsistent indenting displaying for XML doc comments between base member and derived (impl'ed) member #67180
    Next
  • [LSP] Introduce local for all occurrences code action only changes on occurence #71335

PullRequests

Created

  • Include file names in the aggregate exception we create #71694
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #71689
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Restore "Remove properties from DocumentSpan" #71687
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix Spanish test #71686
    Area-Compilers, 17.10
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2356139 #71685
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • [Razor Cohost] Pass TextDocuments to Razor for text sync LSP messages #71671
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upstream changes from Vertical Build PoC #71666
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Ensure we find the right partial if we have multiple in one file #71693
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix Persistent Storage tests #71692
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Target Workspace and Features layer tests to .NET #71590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update TeamFoundationServerClientVersion #71683
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix rolling CI #71681
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: update conversion tests for overload resolution failure #71452
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Fix validation pipeline #71688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71690
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix language id mapping for TS/JS #71684
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused code #71674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Preserve the whitespaces when rewriting an inheritdoc #71589
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #71665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix build definition #71682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations when creating CompositeText instances. #71493
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify how we add .editorconfigs to Solution Items #71626
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71677
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Turn off auto surround in integration tests #71656
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71675
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use VSCode compatible buildhost #71668
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add publishdata for the Xaml LSP #71670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure thread-safety in aggregated telemetry #71606
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify the work with generated BoundNodes and emit the xml comments as doc comment in the generated code file #71601
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10
  • Don't create the InheritanceMarginTagger for preview views. #71618
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Invoke code mapper via reflection #70667
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix intercepting a struct or enum base method #71655
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch CpsDiagnosticItemSourceProvider to use IProjectTree/ProjectTreeFlags #71664
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add IDisposable to KeyValueLogMessage #71608
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Remove GitHub automation requiring reviews when the SDK version changes #71276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expose programmatic suppressions from SuppressionInfo #71207
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • aspnetcore-browser-refresh injection doesn't respect path prefix #53454
  • Blazor .net 8 Cannot access a disposed context instance #53450
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates #53445
  • Convert all the internal static readonly string values on Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.IdentityConstants.cs to const #53442
  • More verbose logging in dotnet watch #53440
  • In consistency in ProblemDetails and ValidationProblemDetails implementation #53439
  • [Blazor] Way to run the E2E tests against the MT #53435
  • Identity 8 doesnt work on PostgresSQL #53433
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles.StaticFileMiddleware[16] The WebRootPath was not found: C:\Users\xxx\web\razorcli\wwwroot. Static files may be unavailable." displays after running razor.dll file in CLI. #53432
  • Swagger document generated for JSON Transcoding enabled grpc server stream response, returns only single object #53431
  • Align HTTP tracing with OTEL semantic conventions #53430
  • SignalR .NET client telemetry #53429
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #53428

Closed

  • `UseDirectoryBrowser` option for JSON responses #53421
  • Automate SDK updates #52886
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #53418
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot #53419
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #53446
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #53282
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53279
  • HeadContent with prerender=false doesn't work #52368
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor SSR: per-user state management #47796
    .NET 9 Planning
  • How implement json web token in .net c#? #53441
  • Move Blazor endpoints source generation into Razor compiler #48767
    .NET 9 Planning
  • When rendering interactive components, ability to pass in passive RenderFragment as parameter #46991
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Application State in BlazorApp .Net 8 #53061
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #53352
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #53348
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #53347
  • Integrate with WebAssembly multithreading #48768
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor Server applications do not work with CloudFlare / auto minification #53437
  • Blazor QuickGrid getting selected row #52751
  • Blazor Web App does not (always) recompile WebAssembly project when changes were made to RCL project #52148
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.24067.4 #53449
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove suffixes from docker containers #53447
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix stale values from [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #53443
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Auto-approve SDK updates #53451
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Allow `null` parameter values to be supplied to interactive components via enhanced page update #53342
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • Update update-sdk workflow #53448
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Update karma.local.conf.js #53410
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 7.0.16
  • [release/8.0] Update karma.local.conf.js #53411
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 8.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Update karma.local.conf.js #53412
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.27
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Accept an HTML encoder instance from DI if available #53213

  • Harden SignatureEquals nullability checks #53052

  • [Blazor] Prevent NPE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problems accessing StaticResource from merged resource dictionaries when using MAUI Embedded in iOS #19959
  • StackLayout/Grid adds extra padding when there's a Border inside #19958
  • [iOS] Sticky header panel covers content in a scrollview when using ReturnType="Next" on Entry fields #19956
  • Flyout doesn't load the page after navigating back #19955
  • Issue when using BindableLayout and Entry/Editor with special characters #19954
  • [Android] App crashes after adding a custom control #19953
  • [Android] ToolbarItem shows incorrect image on different pages on initial load when used in Shell #19950
  • Adding a Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged handler does not work on Android 14 #19949
  • .NET 8 iOS app build error when using Xamarin.Firebase.iOS.Core NuGet: bitcode_strip: missing argument(s) #19946
  • GetTypeNameFromCustomNamespace does not cache duplicate results #19944
  • RadioButton TextColor doesn't change iOS/MacCatalyst #19943
  • [Windows] Blazor Hybrid flickers on launch (white, then gray background) #19942
  • After migrating to .NET8, mobile app has issues building on Visual Studio only on Windows #19939
  • `<ScrollView>` lags and stutters when many `<Label>` Text updates happen periodically while trying to scroll on physical `iOS` device #19938
  • [IOS] Child Element Properties (e.g., Height) Not Updating Dynamically within LayoutControl (StackLayout/FlexLayout) when Modified at Runtime #19937

Closed

  • Project Requires Installation of .Net Workloads: Maui-Tizen #19719
  • MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync broken on Android in nightly builds #19821
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Databinding errors on ListView - What am I doing wrong? #19873

PullRequests

Created

  • Create devcontainer.json #19947
    community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [XC] only generate the services that'll be used #19945
  • [iOS] Add iOS17 tests again #19941
  • [iOS] Update to stable iOS for xcode 15.1 #19940

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml to 8.0.6 #19952
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr1' into main #19936

Updated

  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR3
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • Rectify the scopes in the builder #19932
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    community ✨
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19907
  • [iOS][NativeAOT] Adding NativeAOT RunOniOS device test #19923
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing, .NET 9 Planning
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
